5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Ubaidullah bin ‘Abdullah said:“Dahhak bin Qais wrote to Nu’man bin Bashir, saying: ‘Tell us what the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to recite on Friday along with Surah Al-Jumu’ah.’ He said: ‘He used to recite: “Has there come to you the narration of the overwhelming (i.e., the Day of Resurrection)?’” [Al-Ghashiyah]

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the recitation in the Prayer on Friday
